Package Server.Deck

Interface Deckable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AchievementDeck, GoldDeck, ResourceDeck
public interface Deckable
Interface for the decks

  • Method Details

    • popCard

      Card popCard(DeckPosition position) throws AlreadyFinishedException
      Removes a card from the deck and returns it
      Parameters:
      position - the position where to remove the card from
      Returns:
      the card from the position
      Throws:
      AlreadyFinishedException - if the deck is empty in the selected position
      See Also:
      • DeckPosition

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the deck is empty
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty in all of its positions

    • addCard

      void addCard(Card card, DeckPosition position) throws IncorrectDeckPositionException
      Add card to the board in the specified position
      Parameters:
      card - card to add
      position - position to add the card to
      Throws:
      IncorrectDeckPositionException - if the position is not in the board (i.e. the deck itself)
      See Also:
      • DeckPosition

    • getTopCardNoPop

      Card getTopCardNoPop()
      Returns the card on top of the deck without removing it
      Returns:
      the card on top of the deck
